item.description:
From the Whiskey Republic (http://www.thewhiskeyrepublic.com/):

"Bring your doggie to the deck every Tuesday (from 5:30p - 8:00p) & enjoy our doggone great specials! 1/2 Priced Apps, $2 Pabst & $3 Narragansetts! There will also be Complimentary Dog Treats!

A special shout out to the Providence Animal Rescue League who will also be there! Find them at their table and adopt a pet or two!! Their website is http://www.parl.org/ for more info!"

Strut your bully & change some minds!

If you are having behavioral issues preventing your dog from being able to attend events like this, please email justcassie101@gmail.com for information, references and resources to help!
item.name: Dog Days on the Deck at the Whiskey Republic w/PARL!
